title: LEGO Star Wars 75416 Chopper (C1-10P) Astromech Droid Figure - Building Toy with Lever-Activated Head Movements, Detachable Arms & Centre Wheel - Gift for Ahsoka Fans, Boys & Girls Aged 10+
features: LEGO Star Wars building toy for 10+ year old boys and girls – Create a playful display with a buildable figure of beloved astromech droid Chopper (C1-10P), as seen in the Star Wars: Ahsoka adventure series
LEGO Star Wars droid with authentic details – Rotate Chopper’s lever-activated head, adjust his antenna, pose his arms and legs, or fold out a tool from his chest for interactive play and display
Different display options – The Star Wars figure’s arms and centre wheel can be easily removed, allowing fans to display him with retracted limbs just like in Star Wars: Ahsoka
Build-and-display set – The building toy includes a display stand with an information plaque, plus a standard-size Chopper (C1-10P) LEGO Star Wars droid figure to complete the collection
LEGO Star Wars gift for kids and families – This building toy makes a great birthday gift for 10+ year old boys, girls, Star Wars fans and families who enjoy building together
Build Together with family and friends – Use the LEGO Builder app to collaborate on the build, track progress and enjoy a fun and interactive LEGO Star Wars experience
LEGO Star Wars sets for all ages – Collectible LEGO Star Wars building sets (sold separately) let kids and adult fans relive classic scenes, create stories or display the buildable models
description: From the manufacturer Build-and-display set Fantastic LEGO Star Wars gift for family fun Great for building with family and friends, this buildable display model of Chopper (C1-10P) is a fun and creative way for kids and any Star Wars: Ahsoka fans to showcase their passion. Authentic details Create characteristic Chopper poses This buildable LEGO figure of the beloved astromech droid Chopper, as seen in Star Wars: Ahsoka and Star Wars: Rebels, has lots of realistic details and cool features that enable builders to display their creation their way. Previous page Authentic head movements Move the lever to activate Chopper’s iconic head movements. Detachable arms and centre wheel Display Chopper as if his arms and wheel have been retracted into his body. Chopper LEGO Star Wars droid figure The set also includes a standard-size Chopper LEGO droid figure to add to the display. Tool Fold out the tool from Chopper’s chest. Next page App-assisted building Build Together with friends and family The LEGO Builder app offers a fun and collaborative experience that enables kids, friends and family members of all ages to share the fun of LEGO building and spend quality time together. Gifts for Star Wars fans LEGO Star Wars collectible building toys Explore the extensive range of LEGO Star Wars sets (each sold separately) for kids and discover other authentically detailed buildable LEGO figures of popular characters for display. Previous page R2-D2 Kids can show their affection for the most adorable droid in the galaxy with this 25th anniversary LEGO Star Wars set. Grogu with Hover Pram Fans build their love of Grogu and create playful room decor with this posable brick-built LEGO figure, which can be displayed in or out of the hover pram. Next page

product_details_tab_data.Safety Warning: Warning! Choking hazard. Small parts. Not suitable for children under 3 years old.
